name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lamar ANDERSON, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lamar ANDERSON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of June, 2010, the Petition for File Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. See Pa. R.Crim.P 122(B). Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lamar ANDERSON, Petitioner.
No. 13 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 14, 2010.
